thoughts.content:
# Three Natures

1. Other dependent nature 
    1. Name
    2. Appearance 
    3. Actor thinking
2. Fully conceptualized nature
    1. Discrimination 
    2. Audience thinking
3. Fully accomplished nature
    1. Right knowledge 
    2. Suchness
    3. Director thinking
